message.email-wrong-format: The provided email address is not valid
message.email-in-use: There is already a user registered with this email address
message.password-policy: please provide a valid password (minimum 8 characters, 1 capital and 1 number)
message.password-match: The provided passwords do not match

message.email-unknown: There is no user registered with this email address
message.something-went-wrong: Something went wrong on our side. Please try again later while we try to fix the problem.
message.login-failed: Wrong combination of email and password

message.change-email: Your email address is used to sign-in to the You-Coach application

become-a-coach.title: Apply to become a coach

text.become-a-coach: In order to become a Coach, you need to contact the administrator and explain him why you want to do it, the topic(s) you are going to coach and your current results in each topic.
text.under-construction:
This part of the application is currently still under construction. In order to become a coach please send an email to your administrator with the following information:

Your full name
Your motivation to become a coach
The list of topics (topic + grade) on which you would like to coach

label.mail-content: Write here why and in which topic you want to become a coach.

become-a-coach.email-body: Write your name, motivation, and topic list

request-profile-change.title: Request profile change

text.change-topics: You can send a request to change your subjects here. Please list the subjects you are enrolled in.
text.under-construction:
This part of the application is currently still under construction. In order to request a change to your profile please send an email to your administrator with the following information:

Your full name
The list of topics (topic + grade) for which you would like a change

label.mail-content: Write here the reason of this change

request-profile-change.email-body: Write your name and the list of topics (topic + grade) for which you would like a change

label.search-placeholder: First name, last name or email

label.subject: On which topic/subject would you like to have a coaching session?

message.date-past: The date you've selected is in the past

message.coach-feedback-provided: You can keep updating your feedback as long as the coachee hasn't provided feedback.
message.coachee-feedback-provided: You can keep updating your feedback as long as the coach hasn't provided feedback.

question.coach-clear-explanation: Were the explanations given by your Coach clear?
question.what-did-you-like: What did you like in the coaching session?
question.how-can-coach-get-better: How could your Coach get better?
question.coach-willing-to-learn: Was the Coachee willing to learn and make progress?
question.coach-well-prepared: Was the Coachee well prepared for the coaching session?
question.how-can-coachee-get-better: How could your Coachee get better?

message.file-too-big: Profile images have a maximum size of 3MB

footer.message: You-Coach is an academic coaching program between students in secondary schools, supervised by the schools started by the
